articles.title: Fairfax Co. pilots AI for nonemergency 911 calls
articles.summary: Fairfax County is testing the use of artificial intelligence to triage nonemergency 911 calls, with hopes of getting residents and visitors help faster.
articles.translated_title: Fairfax Co. pilots AI for nonemergency 911 calls
articles.translated_summary: Fairfax County is testing the use of artificial intelligence to triage nonemergency 911 calls, with hopes of getting residents and visitors help faster.

articles.title: Apple Loses Robotics AI Researcher to Meta
articles.summary: Apple's lead artificial intelligence researcher for robotics is leaving the company for Meta, reports Bloomberg. Jian Zhang joined the Meta...

articles.title: How Generative Artificial Intelligence Is Shaking Up Enterprise Software
articles.summary: Since generative artificial intelligence arrived, a big debate on Wall Street has been its impact on enterprise software companies.
articles.translated_title: How Generative Artificial Intelligence Is Shaking Up Enterprise Software

articles.title: How AI Firms Like OpenAI and Meta Are Stealing Music: Investigation
articles.summary: How AI firms like OpenAI and Meta steal music by scraping copyrighted works to train generative artificial intelligence systems, according to ICMP.
articles.translated_title: How AI Firms Like OpenAI and Meta Are Stealing Music: Investigation

articles.title: Anthropic Raises Its Valuation to $183 Billion in New Funding
articles.summary: The artificial intelligence start-up garnered another $13 billion as its valuation rose by nearly three times, from $61.5 billion earlier this year, amid a frenzy over the technology.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic Raises Its Valuation to $183 Billion in New Funding
articles.translated_summary: The artificial intelligence start-up garnered another $13 billion as its valuation rose by nearly three times, from $61.5 billion earlier this year, amid a frenzy over the technology.

articles.title: Salesforce investors hope for faster growth, AI progress in earnings
articles.summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.
articles.translated_title: Salesforce investors hope for faster growth, AI progress in earnings
articles.translated_summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.

articles.title: Anthropic valued at $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it had raised $13 billion at a $183 billion post-money valuation led by investment firm ICONIQ.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic valued at $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.translated_summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it had raised $13 billion at a $183 billion post-money valuation led by investment firm ICONIQ.

articles.title: Anthropic's valuation more than doubles to $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it is now valued at $183 billion post-money, over twice as much as its earlier valuation, as investor enthusiasm towards AI startups stays strong despite some doubts over tech industry spending.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic's valuation more than doubles to $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.translated_summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it is now valued at $183 billion post-money, over twice as much as its earlier valuation, as investor enthusiasm towards AI startups stays strong despite some doubts over tech industry spending.

articles.title: Anthropic Completes New Funding Round at $183 Billion Valuation
articles.summary: Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised ‚Äî a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.
